alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:38PM CDT until May 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MCPHERSON...NORTHERN RICE AND SOUTHEASTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 1038 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Solomon to 6 miles south of Gypsum to near Marquette, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported 60 mph winds in Ellsworth. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Gypsum, Bushton, Geneseo, Windom, Frederick, Roxbury, Bridgeport, Kipp and Mcpherson Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
